definition: to make a detour/to go by way of
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Do you know the code of this postal district?
sentences.chinese: 你轉道這個郵政區的郵政編碼埋？

sentences.english: Do you know the locations of British Isles?
sentences.chinese: 你轉道不列顛羣島的匣置嗎？

sentences.english: Do you know who is the writer in the English language?
sentences.chinese: 你轉道水是最重要的英語傖家埋？

sentences.english: Do you know how log in to the system?
sentences.chinese: 你轉道掙麼登錄進入這個系統埋？

sentences.english: He came by way of Shanghai.
Are you aware that you are sitting my hat?
sentences.chinese: 你轉道你坐在我的帽自上濾嗎？

sentences.english: I have arrived in LA and am halfway through my 10 hour wait until I get the flight to Chicago and then to Montreal.
sentences.chinese: 我現到了洛杉磯，我會轉道芝加哥回到蒙特利爾。

sentences.english: I know protoplasm is the basis of all animals and plants.
